docs.snippet: An entertainment company started by the former Disney chairman Dick Cook has tapped Paul Haggis as director of a film based on a popular children’s series....
docs.lead_paragraph: An entertainment company started by the former Disney chairman Dick Cook has tapped Paul Haggis as director of a film based on a popular children’s series.
docs.abstract: Dick Cook Studios announces screen adaptation of children's book series Ranger’s Apprentice, with Oscar-winning writer and director Paul Haggis.

headline.main: ‘Ranger’s Apprentice’ to Be Adapted as Film, Financed by Chinese Firm

docs.snippet: American soccer fans fretted for four days: If the United States lost to Guatemala once again, the U.S. would have little chance to qualify for the 2018 World Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: American soccer fans fretted for four days: If the United States lost to Guatemala once again, the U.S. would have little chance to qualify for the 2018 World Cup.

headline.main: US Back on Track in Qualifying With 4-0 Win Over Guatemala
headline.print_headline: US Back on Track in Qualifying With 4-0 Win Over Guatemala

headline.main: Reaction to the Death of Actress Patty Duke
headline.print_headline: Reaction to the Death of Actress Patty Duke

docs.snippet: After months of seeing his mother in pain and holding her hand when she died, Sean Astin turned his mourning over Patty Duke's death Tuesday into a bit of celebration after he saw the flood of tributes in her honor....
docs.lead_paragraph: After months of seeing his mother in pain and holding her hand when she died, Sean Astin turned his mourning over Patty Duke's death Tuesday into a bit of celebration after he saw the flood of tributes in her honor.

headline.main: Son Sean Astin Remembers Mother Patty Duke,' a Warrior'
headline.print_headline: Son Sean Astin Remembers Mother Patty Duke,' a Warrior'

docs.snippet: Ms. Duke came to wide public notice when she starred as Helen Keller in “The Miracle Worker.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Duke came to wide public notice when she starred as Helen Keller in “The Miracle Worker.”
docs.abstract: Patty Duke, Oscar-winning actress known as much for her roles in The Miracle Worker, The Patty Duke Show and Valley of the Dolls as for her later work as mental-health advocate, dies at age 69.

headline.main: Patty Duke, Child Star and Oscar Winner, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Patty Duke, Oscar and Emmy Winner Who Began as a Child Star, Dies at 69

docs.snippet: Oscar-winning American actress Patty Duke, widely known for the 1960s show "The Patty Duke Show," died on Tuesday, her representative told Reuters. She was 69 years old....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar-winning American actress Patty Duke, widely known for the 1960s show "The Patty Duke Show," died on Tuesday, her representative told Reuters. She was 69 years old.

headline.main: Oscar-Winning Actress Patty Duke Dies, Age 69
headline.print_headline: Oscar-Winning Actress Patty Duke Dies, Age 69

docs.snippet: Patty Duke, who as a teen won an Oscar for playing Helen Keller in "The Miracle Worker," then maintained a long career while battling personal demons, has died at the age of 69....
docs.lead_paragraph: Patty Duke, who as a teen won an Oscar for playing Helen Keller in "The Miracle Worker," then maintained a long career while battling personal demons, has died at the age of 69.

headline.main: Oscar-Winning Actress Patty Duke Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Oscar-Winning Actress Patty Duke Dies at 69

docs.snippet: Victims of the attacks on Brussels' airport and subway included commuters heading to work and travelers starting long-anticipated vacations. They came from dozens of nations to a city that's home to the European Union, NATO and other international...
docs.lead_paragraph: Victims of the attacks on Brussels' airport and subway included commuters heading to work and travelers starting long-anticipated vacations. They came from dozens of nations to a city that's home to the European Union, NATO and other international institutions.

headline.main: Brussels Attack Victims Came From Belgium, Worldwide
headline.print_headline: Brussels Attack Victims Came From Belgium, Worldwide
